sourcesContent:
export const colors = {
  // Page
  pageBackground: "transparent",

  // Grid
  gridDot: "#6a208f",
  gridCellBackground: "#f1f1f1",
  gridCellBackgroundDark: "#D6D5EA",
  food: "#ff5c75",
  hazard: "#000000",
  hazardOpacity: "0.3",
  overlapSnake: "#AAAAAA",

  // Scoreboard
  healthBar: "#0f0",
  healthBarBackground: "#fefefe",
  healthBarOutline: "#666",
  healthBarDeathBackground: "#f1f1f1",
  healthBarDeathBackgroundDark: "#59526b",
  avatarHoverBorder: "#888",
  avatarHighlightedBorder: "#6f42c1",

  // Misc
  lightText: "#efefef",
  darkText: "#424242",

  // Colour names (from theme)
  blue: "#007bff",
  indigo: "#6610f2",
  purple: "#6f42c1",
  pink: "#e83e8c",
  red: "#dc3545",
  orange: "#fd7e14",
  yellow: "#ffc107",
  green: "#28a745",
  teal: "#20c997",
  cyan: "#17a2b8",
  white: "#fff",
  gray: "#6c757d",
  grayLight: "#f1f1f1",
  grayDark: "#343a40",
  primary: "#007bff",
  secondary: "#6c757d",
  success: "#28a745",
  info: "#17a2b8",
  warning: "#ffc107",
  danger: "#dc3545",
  light: "#f8f9fa",
  dark: "#343a40"
};

export const breakpoints = {
  sm: "576px",
  md: "768px",
  lg: "992px",
  xl: "1200px",
  xxl: "1650px"
};

export const themes = {
  // Themes
  dark: "dark",
  light: "light"
};
